oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: |han≠kass'o's father-in-law, ||kabbo ('Dream' or Oud Jantje Tooren), throws bones away, and |han–kass'o does the same because he has married into the family. 1) See also Tsatsi's treatment of bones and Treatment of bones, 2) This story is found in Book VIII-14.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd |xam notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ||kabbo's treatment of bones
